about_the_game:
Royal Revolt Warriors blends heart-pounding top-down roguelite action with Survivor-style combat and high replayability. Building on the Royal Revolt legacy, this new high-quality opus offers a fresh solo experience and a thrilling co-op for up to 4 players. Get ready for intense battles and strategic depth!

DEFEND YOUR KINGDOM

Stop the onslaught of evil forces invading your realm! Fight back as they corrupt everything in their path. Rally the strongest Warriors and restore order. The time to reclaim your homeland is now—lead the charge!

RISE OF THE WARRIORS

Master each Warrior’s unique abilities and craft winning strategies to survive. Battle across diverse arenas and landscapes, each filled with unexpected twists, tough objectives, and dynamic challenges.

To crush the vicious hordes ravaging the land, you will need strength, focus, and flawless teamwork. Sharpen your skills, dominate in battle, and brace yourself for the final showdown when you’re ready—or when you have no choice!

MULTIPLAYER MADNESS

You are not forced to fight alone! Dive into battle mayhem with up to 4 players in full-blown co-op mode. Band together with friends and unleash chaos in the Survivor-game genre like never before!

REUNITING THE GANG

Prepare for an epic all-star reunion! The Royal Revolt universe brings together a diverse and charismatic roster of heroes. Rally the squad and take on the ultimate challenge!

RISE TO THE TOP

Unlock powerful upgrades, stack your abilities, and grow stronger with every run. Experiment with countless mighty Weapon and Trinket combinations as you carve your own path to victory.

 

Prepare for the ultimate battle in Royal Revolt Warriors. Step up, unleash your inner Warrior, and crush the invading darkness!

Key Features:

  • Intense Real-Time Combat: Engage in thrilling Survivor-style battles with hundreds of ferocious enemies, making use of countless Weapon and Trinket combinations.

  • Strategic Multiplayer Mayhem: Experience the game with up to 4 players in its white-knuckle co-op mode, working together to overcome even the toughest of challenges.

  • Diverse Enemies and Bosses: Face off against hordes of enemies with different movement patterns and attacks, culminating in epic boss battles.

  • All-Star Warrior Roster: Choose from numerous fan-favorite characters from the beloved Royal Revolt franchise, each with distinct abilities and playstyles.

  • Dynamic Battle Arenas: Explore a dynamically changing world, full of surprises and replayability, ensuring no two playthroughs are the same.

  • High-Quality Graphics: Enjoy stunning visuals, charming characters and a rich, immersive environment, presented in beautifully crafted arenas.

The time has come to defend your kingdom! Will you rise as a Warrior and reclaim your homeland, or will the invading darkness prevail?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Silicon M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Unleash chaos in an electrifying 1-4 player co-op where survival and action-roguelite collide! Battle through relentless enemy hordes with a powerful mix of melee and ranged combat, navigating varied and dynamic environments.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
